trans-unit.source: Creates the theme-specific look for <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref> types, for use with the Classic theme.
trans-unit.target: 创建主题特定于的外观<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref>类型，以用于经典主题。

trans-unit.source: To achieve the Classic look, specify <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush%2A> as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要实现传统型外观，指定<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any other brush will remove the Classic look and render a border of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness%2A>, except in the case of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> elements, which always render in the Classic look.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他画笔将移除传统型外观和呈现的边框<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness%2A>，除非的情况下<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>始终呈现在经典查找的元素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ```   singleChild ``` ## XAML Values `theme:` An xmlns prefix for the CLR namespace.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 对象元素用法```   singleChild ``` # # XAML 值`theme:`为 xmlns 前缀CLR 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown).
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，xmlns 前缀和映射 （未显示） 的 XAML 根元素中定义。

trans-unit.source: *singleChild* A single object element child, representing the object that the border is drawn around.
trans-unit.target: *singleChild*单个对象元素子级，表示周围绘制边框的对象。

trans-unit.source: This object must be a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 此对象必须是一种<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Typical child elements are either a fixed <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> (for example a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path>) or are a presenter or another decorator in compositing.
trans-unit.target: 典型的子元素是固定<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>(例如<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path>) 或者演示程序或合成中的另一个修饰。</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用来填充元素的背景的画笔。

trans-unit.source: The brush used to fill the background of the element.
trans-unit.target: 用于填充元素的背景的画笔。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush used to draw the outer border of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于绘制元素的控件外边框的画笔。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|, , |
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为**true**| 、 |

trans-unit.source: The brush used to draw the outer border of the element.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制元素的控件外边框的画笔。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderBrush*>依赖项属性。</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderBrush*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderStyle"></xref> used to draw the border of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderStyle"></xref>用于绘制元素的边框。

trans-unit.source: To achieve the Classic look, specify <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush%2A> as the BorderStyle.
trans-unit.target: 若要获得经典外观，指定<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush%2A>作为 BorderStyle。</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any other brush will remove the Classic look and render a border of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness%2A>, except in the case of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> elements, which always render in the Classic look.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他画笔将移除传统型外观和呈现的边框<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness%2A>，除非的情况下<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>始终呈现在经典查找的元素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderStyle"> </xref>用于绘制元素的边框。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the border.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |

trans-unit.source: The width of the border.
trans-unit.target: 边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderThickness*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderThickness*>依赖项属性。</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderThickness*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the brush used to draw the border.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于绘制边框的画笔。

trans-unit.source: This brush is used to tell <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator> to draw the border according to the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此画笔用于通知<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator>来绘制根据<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderStyle%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderStyle%2A>边框</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderBrush%2A> is not set to ClassicBorderBrush, a flat style is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderBrush%2A>未设置平面样式绘制到 ClassicBorderBrush，。</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage `<` *object property* `="{x:Static theme:ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush}"/>` ## XAML Values *x:Static* The [x:Static Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法`<`*对象属性* `="{x:Static theme:ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush}"/>` # # XAML 值*X:static* [X:static 标记扩展](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *theme* An xmlns prefix mapping to the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] namespace in a specific assembly.
trans-unit.target: *主题*xmlns 前缀映射到<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]中特定的程序集的命名空间。</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes>

trans-unit.source: The brush used to draw the border.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制边框的画笔。
